name: Platform Studio
description:
Platform Studio is a multiplayer sandbox level editor. Build and play amazing or goofy levels with your friends or solo. As of now there are 20 items in total but more will be added in the future. This game is still in testing phase which means that there will be lots changed in the future.  Please comment or let me know of any bugs or errors you encountered while playing. 

Have Fun!

Controls:
WASD-Move
Space-Jump
E-Dash
Arrow keys-Move cursor
R-Place block
Q-Delete
Z-Rotate
Left control-Switch Camera
1-9-Select block in hotbar
Escape-Inventory
Tab-Teleport player to spawn
To buy a new item click on the card on the right of the inventory, costs 5 coins
